name: Just 2 Squares
description:
A game made in about 6 hours for the 2021 GMTK game Jam with the theme "Joined Together"

Note: If the player randomly gets stuck  on the ground when moving, just jump to get unstuck

Controls:

          Pink Square- W/Jump     A/Left     D/Right

          Yellow Square- UpArrow/Jump     LeftArrow/Left     RightArrow/Right

Goal: In each of the 6 levels,  complete the level by getting the 2 squares to touch each other.

Cyan Block- Moving Platform

Black Block- Conveyor Belt

Red Block- Danger

Yellow Area- No Yellow Player Zone

Pink Area- No Pink Player Zone
